Procedure.name: setupCCG
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=CCB servoSetup=CCB receiversSetup=CCB initialize=CCB device=0 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: setupKKG
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=KKG servoSetup=KKG receiversSetup=KKG receiversMode=SINGLEDISH initialize=KKG device=0 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: telescopePark
Procedure.body: antennaReset goTo=180d,89.8d receiversPark waitOnSource servoPark antennaPark asOff asPark
